discussion.p: The 10,000th value returned by ranlux48_base is supposed to be 61839128582725. We get 192113843633948. (Note that the underlying generator was changed in Kona.)

blockquote.p: Required behavior: The 10000th consecutive invocation of a default-constructed object of type ranlux48_base shall produce the value 61839128582725 192113843633948.
